trans-unit.source: Allows security actions for <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermission"></xref> to be applied to code using declarative security.
trans-unit.target: 可讓安全性動作<xref href="System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermission"></xref>来套用至使用宣告式安全性的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: MediaPermissionAttribute controls the ability for audio, image, and video media to work in a partial-trust Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) application.
trans-unit.target: MediaPermissionAttribute 控制的音訊、 影像和視訊媒體的能力，在部分信任的 Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 應用程式中。

trans-unit.source: The scope of the declaration that is allowed depends on the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction> that is used.
The security information declared by a security attribute is stored in the metadata of the attribute target and is accessed by the system at run time.
trans-unit.target: 安全性屬性所宣告的安全性資訊儲存在屬性目標的中繼資料，而且由系統在執行階段存取。

trans-unit.source: Security attributes are used only for declarative security.
trans-unit.target: 安全性屬性僅用於宣告式安全性。

trans-unit.source: For imperative security, use the corresponding permission class, <xref:System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermission>.
trans-unit.target: 命令式安全性，使用對應的權限類別<xref:System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermission>.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermission>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermissionAttribute"></xref>.

The default media values are <xref:System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermissionAudio>, <xref:System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermissionImage>, and <xref:System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermissionVideo>.
One of the <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction"></xref> values.
Gets or sets the audio permission level for the <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermissionAttribute"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定的音訊權限層級<xref href="System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermissionAttribute"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermissionAudio>.
The state of the <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermissionAudio"></xref>.
Creates and returns a new <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermission"></xref>.
This method should only be called by the security system, never by application code.
trans-unit.target: 只應該由應用程式程式碼永遠不會由安全性系統中，呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: At compile time, attributes convert security declarations to a serialized form in metadata.
trans-unit.target: 在編譯時期，屬性會將安全性宣告轉換成中繼資料的序列化形式。

trans-unit.source: Declarative security data in metadata is created from the permission that this method returns that corresponds to this attribute.
trans-unit.target: 建立中繼資料中的宣告式安全性資料，從 的權限，此方法會傳回對應至這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermission"></xref> that corresponds to this attribute.
Gets or sets the image permission level for the <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermissionAttribute"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定影像的權限層級<xref href="System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermissionAttribute"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermissionImage>.
The state of the <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermissionImage"></xref>.
Gets or sets the video permission level for the <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermissionAttribute"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定影像的權限層級<xref href="System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermissionAttribute"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermissionVideo>.
The state of the <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermissionVideo"></xref>.
